resolutions.title: Use Intel default driver
resolutions.name: glamor
resolutions.description: Poor compatibility for parts of old graphics cards.

resolutions.title: Use Intel compatible mode
resolutions.name: uxa
resolutions.description: Best compatibility for all Intel graphics cards to accelerate, but performance is relatively weak.

resolutions.name: sna
resolutions.title: Use Intel acceleration mode
resolutions.description: Speed up the graphics card with better performance, but unstable in some cards with screen flashing.
